name: Syndicate of Souls
summary: A tactical MOBA with a classic old-school feel and a few innovative twists. In "Syndicate of Souls", battle unfolds across three distinct maps. "Roadway To Ruin" is a 1v1 snowy bridge, providing tense duels. "Deserted Stronghold", a 3v3 map, places players amid swampy ruins, emphasizing team tactics. Lastly, "Dreamfall Grove", a 5v5 battleground, immerses players in a mystical forest with vibrant fauna, promoting expansive team strategies. Each map reflects the game`s emphasis on tactical gameplay, strategic positioning, and environmental interaction.
